website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Pro Heritage 2 is a great shoe. It’s quite affordable and it gets the job done. The shoe receives a great number of compliments in terms of the comfort it provides. Some say it feels like a pillow inside. New buyers will not regret if they cop the Reebok Pro Heritage 2 especially for daily wear.
pros: A good number of wearers recommend the Reebok Pro Heritage 2 because of its durability
One of them says he has been wearing these Reebok shoes for nine months and it has not shown any sign of wear and tear
A couple of users claim that the DMX Foam works because it delivers great bounciness comfort, and impact protection
It works like the Zoom cushioning of the modern-day Kobe AD 2018
The Reebok Pro Heritage 2 fits true to size according to the majority of buyers
Some shoe owners appreciate the classy style of these Reebok basketball shoes
A lot of purchasers decide to get another pair of the Reebok Pro Heritage 2
They say that they are really satisfied with its price, design, and comfort
The Reebok Pro Heritage 2 does not need any break-in time, observe many users
One wearer claims that even with knee-high socks, the shoe model looks great
A huge number of buyers agree that the Reebok Pro Heritage 2 performs too well for its affordable price
cons: One user leaves a comment that the Reebok Pro Heritage 2 does not provide enough arch support
A few mention that the shoelaces feel cheap
Breathability is an issue to some wearers
They say their feet get wet during games
It has the same issue with the leather renditions of the first Air Jordan kicks
Several buyers observe that the Reebok Pro Heritage 2 runs a little narrow
A small number of testers notice that the outsole rubber starts to detach from the shoe after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: Stitching on the side wall came open.
customer_reviews.text: I may have gotten a bad shoe, but the side stitching blew out. I don’t play sports so it just ripped open as I was going about my day. I had them to long to return them but they were like new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: They arrived fast and my hubby says they are very comfortable - even with orthotics. They are nice looking shoes and he's very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Darla Do

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Durable Boy's Shoe at a tremendous price.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old has big feet. He is now past boy sizes. He is a bit on the narrow side. He has a little room to grow in these. He was previous shoe size was 6.5 in boys and those were tight. These seem to be wearing well and fit his need for the snazzy. I finally realized I could look to amazon to provide good boys shoes for him when we had been going to Nick's sporting goods and paying about twice the price for them. These look cook and seem to be durably made and fit well. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Throw Backs
customer_reviews.text: Im a reebok person so I already know my little toe on my left foot is going to get irritated so before playing Bball I wrap it in a band aid. Otherwise I love the shoe as its not as heavy as it looks and I love the leather construction.
customer_reviews.author: Rdgainesjr

customer_reviews.title: Awful. Not worth the shipping, which was free.
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps the worst fitting, most uncomfortable sneakers I have ever purchased. I have been wearing Reeboks for over 20 years, but these are awful. Not worth a dime, much less the money I paid for them. I suspect they are factory rejects sold as first quality. I have done everything possible to break these in to make them comfortable, including inserts, to no avail. NEVER AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: John Fillion

customer_reviews.title: A good value, but a bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to buy shoes online. I always have worn a size 8. I bought another pair of Reebok's that were size 8 and way to small and narrow. At 8 1/2, the length fits much better. But they are still a bit narrow. You may have to go one full size bigger to get them to fit right. I do not have wide feet either. But the shoes are pretty comfortable. I think after I wear them more they will fit better.
customer_reviews.author: MarcoB

customer_reviews.title: look elsewhere unless you have wildly high arches...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return... absolutely ZERO arch support, coupled with way too narrow instep-- foot rolls inside immediately, unless you have unnaturally high arches. For a flat-footed person, a nightmare and a no-go.
customer_reviews.author: petrojo

customer_reviews.title: Old School
customer_reviews.text: Since I am an old schooler and I like to wear white sneakers, these are the ones. They remind me of my younger days and they look fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: electrical281

customer_reviews.title: Good, however - Bright Orange/Tight high top
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. 1st, the orange color part is brighter than the picture we saw on amazon, so be aware of that. The only problem with this shoe is the high top part is too tight and hurts my husband's ankle a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Second time buyer
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair in the gray suede previously, this shoe does not seem as supportive. Still a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: William Poulos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoe !!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I wanted. I remember these from back in the day. When I was sixteen I wore a pair of white and blue ones. These ones are a little more updated and classy and they still fit really well. Wore them already and got several compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, fit is right a little boxy in ...
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, fit is right a little boxy in tow area. Not great insole but works well enough. I really enjoy wearing these on the outdoor court. Fit was right
customer_reviews.author: basmati_riceee

customer_reviews.title: For the price this a good shoe. I play three times a week and ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price this a good shoe. I play three times a week and this is a great budget friendly choice with out sacrificing quality or comfort.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: have had to glue the tips of the soles back on several times but fit and feel nice
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hensley

customer_reviews.title: I like Reebok shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like Reebok shoes, but these were somewhat small and tight. Not enough padding overall. I feared this would cause my feet problems so I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small. Beware
customer_reviews.text: Came in a timely manner. New box but somewhat desheveled inside. Sneakers are a bit darker in life then on line but not an issue. I wear a 10.5 and have many other Reebox that fit perfect but this pair at size 11 is still a bit small. I read that it runs a bit small so I got the 11. But the way it is made it is tight. Not sure what i plan to do about it. But the shoe is real and new and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes but the soles didn't hold up. They started to come unglues within three months.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son is hard on shoes and these seem to made tough enough to hold up to his abuse. They fit and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes do not provide as much arch support as some Reebok shoes, but it still does the job. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: eddy

customer_reviews.title: He says they are really soft inside and comfortable. So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 5th grader who loves basketball. He says they are really soft inside and comfortable. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Pro heritage 2
customer_reviews.text: these shoes were exactly what I expected from Reebok. they fit perfect. the shoes had no defects and the DMX foam provides superior cushioning. I would order them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Bobblue

customer_reviews.title: ... a few hours they stretch a bit and feel great!
customer_reviews.text: Little narrow at first but after wearing a few hours they stretch a bit and feel great !
customer_reviews.author: B. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great looking sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Only one word to describe this really comfortable and great looking sneakers beautiful it fits as expected
customer_reviews.author: ricardo aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and I look awesome on the court
customer_reviews.author: Aaron DeYoung

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For me only Reeboks are comfortable to wear all the time.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Reeboks. I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Myles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, the laces did seem cheap but the shoe is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tight fit, am reminded often, when I wear these shoes
customer_reviews.author: dakmar

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these shoes turned my ankles inward, the sole was not level. If I didn't know better I'd say these were factory seconds. Obviously I returned them. To bad I really dug the retro Red/White and Blue
customer_reviews.author: Tim Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Very pillow like inside the shoe
customer_reviews.text: I only use the shoes for basketball. These shoes are not as breathable as some of the others I have worn. It fits well enough. Very pillow like inside the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: jonavon

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my son, he said they were uncomfortable and caused ankle pain.
customer_reviews.author: c mcghee

customer_reviews.title: it is very comfortable, much better than my Adidas Isolation 2
customer_reviews.text: It’s the first time that I have purchase Reebok Basketball shoes, it is very comfortable , much better than my Adidas Isolation 2 ! The size is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tuvia S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First time i ordered sneakers and the leather was actually white instead of faded yellow leather thank you
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The right shoe was smaller than the left it was to tight
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: i have arch supports from the good feet store here in jax
customer_reviews.text: i have arch supports from the good feet store here in jax, i do wish i could get high tops like we used to be able to get
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes they are nice but they are tight at the toes
customer_reviews.author: Marty Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Old School
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Wore them to bed the first night and woke up having to remove them, but played basketball in them two days later. Reminds me of my old days playing. Even bought knee high white socks (no stripes at the top like my old tube socks) to complete the set.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A Lee

customer_reviews.title: Size fit
customer_reviews.text: The item was delayed but it is okay. The size is fit and good as expected. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Jitiam

customer_reviews.title: I'm wondering if we're getting Asian shoes in the USA ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm wondering if we're getting Asian shoes in the USA, because they are all on the narrow side. Can't seem to buy a pair of shoes, with out them being too narrow. I'm not big either 5'8 160. Bought a wooden stretcher, for this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the other reviewers who said this shoe runs very small and narrow. I normally wear a 10 1/2 sneaker, ordered a size 11 and it's way too small and narrow - like maybe a size 9! Received it today, returning it today.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Triplett

customer_reviews.title: SNEAKY SNEAKER
customer_reviews.text: I CAN RUN FAST AND SKIP AND HOP WITH THE OTHER KIDS.
customer_reviews.author: FELIX THE CAT

customer_reviews.title: Great All Around Basketball Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great Fit, Good Quality, A Very Nice Look And Feel, Good arch support.. Great Price And Super Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: HE was very happy with these shoes.The fit was very well and they arrived very fast.GReat job..
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

product_meta.title: Reebok Mens Pro Heritage 2-M Pro Heritage 2-m
product_meta.description: Pay homage to your on-court heritage in this basketball classic comeback. A premium leather upper, customizable pump, and slashes of intense color tip this shoe toward luxurious, supportive comfort and aggressive style. A herringbone tread pattern packs in hardwood traction, while hits of mesh...
feature_bullets: Leather upper with mesh underlays for comfort and breathability.
Pump in the tongue and a mid-cut design for adjustability and stability.
Hexalite 5mm honeycomb technology for lightweight cushion and support.
Herringbone outsole tread pattern for improved traction on the court.
High abrasion rubber outsole for time-tested durability.
